text: Krampus is a 2015 American fantasy comedy horror movie based on Krampus from Alpine folklore. It was directed by Michael Dougherty and written by Dougherty, Todd Casey, and Zach Shields. The movie stars Adam Scott, Toni Collette, David Koechner, Allison Tolman, Conchata Ferrell, Emjay Anthony, Stefania LaVie Owen, and Krista Stadler. It was theatrically released in the Philippines on December 2, 2015, by Columbia Pictures, and in the United States on December 4, 2015, by Universal Pictures to mixed reviews. ==References== Category:2015 horror movies Category:2015 comedy movies Category:2015 fantasy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:2010s American fantasy movies Category:American horror movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Krampus (movie)
